titleStmt.title: A plea for peace: shewing the dignitie of princes, against the many railings of the rabble, the invectives of the ignorant, and murmurs of the malicious. Written by a well-wisher to the peace of this our Sion.
titleStmt.author: A Well-Wisher to the Peace of This Our Sion.

publicationStmt.publisher: September 22. London, Printed for Francis Coles,

notesStmt.note: Print show-through. Trimmed at foot, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
